data.text: @udstree Hi @udstree, we have escalated your request to our customer support team and a representative will get back to you shortly. Thank you for your patience and for giving us the chance to make things right! 💚
@Bounce7 We’re very sorry and want to make things right. Please send us a DM with your details so we can rectify this for you.
@djhamro It will! 😊
@bethnalgreen08 Thank you for your support @bethnalgreen08 💚 We are not going anywhere 💪
@miss01102 Rest assured your flights are not in jeopardy! We truly appreciate your continued support 💚
@JustARachael Hi @JustARachael 👋 Our live chat team is here to help! Please shoot us a message by going to https://t.co/pjbLu2l6Vy

@miss01102 Hi! We are working very closely with the CTA and the Ministry of Transport, we understand their concerns, and we have resolutions proposed for all of the issues identified. We're here for the long haul.

@oscarduker Hi @oscarduker, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We want to make this right, please connect with our live chat team by going to https://t.co/pjbLu2l6Vy and they will be able to quickly assist you!
@markrenaud Thank you for your continuous support, Mark! 💚

We've read the news, and the comments and we understand the sentiment caused by the media. We are a Canadian airline that will be here for years to come. Committed to our purpose: Value travel for Canadians. https://t.co/43XuM1VzAQ

@neilwadhwa Thank you for choosing Flair airline. 
I can assure you that Flair is going to be around for your flights and well into the future.
@lovejivansidhu We’re very sorry and want to make things right. Please send us a DM with your details so we can rectify this for you.

@DelroyDyer89 We sincerely apologize about that, that must have been frustrating we promise you that something like this will not happen again. We looking forward to be booking with you again in future and give you an awesome flight experience.

urls.title: Customize & Book Cheap Flights to Kelowna | Flair Airlines
urls.description: Planning to fly to Kelowna? Fly solo or grab your favourite buddy and book cheap flights to Kelowna YLW. Book Flair Airlines now & save big!

data.text:
Low prices. Wine not? 🍷

With over 40 wineries in and near Kelowna, there's no shortage of vineyards (and views) to visit! Flair flights from #YEG-#YLW start at just $49*. Book your getaway today! https://t.co/0J3cwX49hX

*one-way. taxes & fees incl. Limited seats available. https://t.co/drnQZHOR9P

data.text: @DelroyDyer89 Please kindly provide us with your reservation number, first and last name, telephone number, email address and date of birth for further assistance

Planning an upcoming golf trip? This putts for you. 👉
Check your clubs online up to 24 hours prior to departure to save more and stress less. Trust Flair to handle your equipment like a pro and enjoy a hassle-free experience.
Visit https://t.co/6jn9G5ec1l for more info. https://t.co/9Aaq3U8yWI

@Diego13escobedo I'll be more than happy to assist you.
The email is correct.
@sauteedcarrot Hey Saute, thank you for contacting Flair Airlines my name is i will be more than happy to assist you, may i please please advise me as to how i may assist you.
@VicedoElisa Is there anything else that you would like me to further assist you with?
@VicedoElisa I am really sorry that we are in possession of your funds, kindly please provide me with your reservation number please so i can be able to assist further.

@fsfirecracker Hi Flair Guest, thank you for reaching out to Flair Airlines. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience regarding your delayed baggage, I will be escalating the matter to the department that deals directly with your inquiry.
@Girrl_Friday Sorry to hear about your experience, please send us a direct message and we'll get back to you right away.
